projects.name: Haiku Finder
projects.description: Uses JS to try and create a haiku from user inputted text.

projects.name: 3D Traffic Simulator
projects.description: A 3D-rendered simulation of traffic light control of a small section of a city grid using the JavaFX library that I helped co-develop.

projects.name: Breakout Competitive - Java Networking Project
projects.description: A team developed game of 4-player breakout using a UDP connection. Developed with Ethan Puzak and Araceli Casas.

projects.name: Endless Centipede - Live Game Practice
projects.description: A game I made in Java using JavaFX. It is a clone of the classic arcade game Centipede.

projects.name: Hexapawn - Reinforced Learning
projects.description: Made with Java and JavaFX. Uses Reinforced Learning to eventually play a perfect game.

projects.name: Multiplication Circle - JavaFX Animation
projects.description: A simple animation made with Java and JavaFX. Visualizes multiplication patterns given user input.
